title: Self-Regulated Learning Enhancement Program for Adult Learners: Simulation/VR-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and foundational understanding of social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical training conducted through VR device rentals in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with strengthened social support through learner interaction.

learning_goals: Learners achieve self-target achievement rates of 80% or higher in social studies simulation tasks using self-regulated learning strategies
Learners can systematically analyze their learning process and develop improvement plans through weekly reflective journals.
Learners apply at least three self-regulated learning strategies (e.g., time management, resource utilization) when solving real-world problems by referencing modeling examples.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
